description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a by a later hand. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on front flyleaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 17-21 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Marginal damp-staining; a few repairs. Leaves 1-2 detached. Origin: Likely 18th century.
author: ʻĀmilī, Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn, 1547-1621
abstract: Text on Shiʻite fiqh preceded by a short text meant as its introduction.
contents: 2. leaves 6a-275b: [al-Ḥabl al-matīn fī iḥkām aḥkām al-dīn].
extent: 274 leaves : paper ; 202 x 144 (138-150 x 91-99) mm bound to 208 x 147 mm
title: Kitāb Dirāyah wa-Kitāb Ḥabl al-matīn
creator: عاملي، بهاء الدين محمد بن حسين، 1547-1621
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding note: Full red-brown leather with blind-stamped fillets.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
